Mea Culpa...fixed already in HEAD (I think...;-).

I'm also in the process of fixing another regression in the editor area state management (bug 177181). These were introduced by changes needed to bring the RCP/API support up to spec...sorry.


Verified in I20070501-0010. (i.e. cant repro)
